name: Boss Rush Jam 2023 Entry
description:
An entry in Boss Rush Jam 2023, and my first submission to a game jam. This ultimately fell short of what I'd have liked it to be, but I'm still happy to have put something together.

The game consists of three battles against simplistic enemies on a 6x3 grid divided into halves - the left half for the player and the right half for the enemies. Before each battle, the player must create a new action for each of their three party members - these actions consist of a "skill" which determines which panels on the grid the party member will target, and an "effect" which determines what happens to targeted panels.

If you're in the Boss Rush Jam Discord and find any issues, feel free to ping me (sbebular#3293) - I'm aware of some oddities with animations not playing properly for actions with the SplashDamage effect, but there could easily be something I missed.
